original_text: All the Jews and Gentiles who lived in Ephesus heard about this. They became very afraid. Now they respected the name of the Lord Jesus very much. They knew that he was very powerful.
korean_text: 에베소에 사는 유대인과 헬라인들이 다 이 일을 알고 두려워하며 주 예수의 이름을 높이고

sentences.original_text: All the Jews and Gentiles who lived in Ephesus
Now they respected the name of the Lord Jesus very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주 예수의 이름을 매우 존경했습니다

sentences.original_text: They knew that he was very powerful
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 매우 강력하다는 것을 알았습니다
